title: How to Create a Feminine Bathroom

steps.headline: Get some pink, light blue or cream silky curtains to hang up at the window.
Get a toilet seat in pink or cream.
Get pink, light blue or cream shower curtains in the same colour as the regular curtains.
Paint the walls in a rose pink colour, or use a colour that's deep but not too dark.
Hang up soft, fluffy robes and put some slippers in the room.
Get some white, cream or pink towels.
steps.description: Put them on a heated rail.

steps.headline: Get a mirror above the sink.
steps.description: Choose one with a white frame or in a shape like a heart. You could hang a feather boa around it.

steps.headline: Have a box or draw for your beauty products.
steps.description: Fill it with scented shower gels, shampoos and conditioners.

steps.headline: Hang up some fairy lights round the ceiling: very relaxing if your having a bath.
Finish up.
steps.description: Add a picture to a bare looking wall and if there is spare space on shelves or dressers add decorations like scented candles, vases of fake flowers, beautiful shells or ornate perfume bottles.

text: Get some pink, light blue or cream silky curtains to hang up at the window.  Get a toilet seat in pink or cream. Maybe with a sophisticated pattern. Get an elegant bathroom mat.  Get pink, light blue or cream shower curtains in the same colour as the regular curtains.  Paint the walls in a rose pink colour, or use a colour that's deep but not too dark.  Hang up soft, fluffy robes and put some slippers in the room.  Get some white, cream or pink towels. Put them on a heated rail. Get a mirror above the sink. Choose one with a white frame or in a shape like a heart. You could hang a feather boa around it. Have a box or draw for your beauty products. Fill it with scented shower gels, shampoos and conditioners. Hang up some fairy lights round the ceiling: very relaxing if your having a bath.  Finish up. Add a picture to a bare looking wall and if there is spare space on shelves or dressers add decorations like scented candles, vases of fake flowers, beautiful shells or ornate perfume bottles.
